Description

Death By Misstep is an upcoming First-Person Rhythm, Stealth and Horror game.

History

In a dystopian cyberpunk world, Jessica, an adolescent girl finds herself trapped on a luxury party cruise turned into a nightmarish slaughterhouse when all security robots malfunction and start a merciless killing spree. Desperately she must navigate through the chaos, breathing in time with the beat of the cruise ship's songs, so that this bloodthirsty machines don't discover her. This psychological horror, rhythm and stealth videogame immerses players into a terrifying experience where every step is a fight for survival.

Features

  • Breathe to the beat of the music so the cruise ship's robots don't detect you!
  • Find a way to leave the ship without dying... Don't let them see you!
  • Unveil the terrifying backstory of Jessica and the Samos cruise ship.
